content:
Staying near the airport can be very convenient, especially if you have an early morning flight or a late arrival.

There are many great hotels near O'Hare International Airport (ORD). Here are some top-rated options to consider:

1. **The Westin O'Hare**: This 4-star hotel is connected to the airport via a free shuttle and offers modern rooms, an indoor pool, and a fitness center.
2. **Hilton Chicago O'Hare Airport**: Another 4-star option with a free shuttle to the airport, this hotel features comfortable rooms, an indoor pool, and several dining options.
3. **Hyatt Regency O'Hare**: This 4-star hotel offers a free shuttle to the airport and features spacious rooms, an indoor pool, and a fitness center.
4. **Loews Chicago O'Hare Hotel**: This 4-star hotel provides a free shuttle to the airport and offers modern rooms, an indoor pool, and a fitness center.
5. **Renaissance Chicago O'Hare Suites Hotel**: This 3-star hotel offers a free shuttle to the airport and features spacious suites, an indoor pool, and a fitness center.

All of these hotels are within a 5-mile radius of the airport and offer a range of amenities to make your stay comfortable. You can check their websites or a hotel booking website like Expedia, Booking.com, or Hotels.com to compare prices and find the best deals.

Keep in mind that prices may vary depending on the time of year, room type, and availability. Be sure to read reviews and check the hotel's policies on amenities like parking, breakfast, and airport shuttle services.

If you're looking for more budget-friendly options, there are also several 2-star and 3-star hotels in the area that offer comfortable stays at a lower price point.

Let me know if you have any specific preferences or requirements, and I can try to suggest more tailored options!
